name: getPipelineContainerLog
description:
Retrieve the log file for a build container or service container.

This endpoint supports (and encourages!) the use of [HTTP Range requests](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7233) to deal with potentially very large log files.

workspace.description: This can either be the workspace ID (slug) or the workspace UUID surrounded by curly-braces, for example `{workspace UUID}`.

log_uuid.description: For the main build container specify the step UUID; for a service container specify the service container UUID

$block: Base type for most resource objects. It defines the common `type` element that identifies an object's type. It also identifies the element as Swagger's `discriminator`.

$ul: **data**: Optional structured data that is endpoint-specific.
